<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.service_management.core.cms" name="CMS User Interface - Service Management Core" state="published" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" help="Content_Management_Overview" cache_flush="true">
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.cms"/> <import plugin="com.glide.cms.extensions"/> <import plugin="com.glide.db_images" /> </requires>
<description>All CMS items (blocks, pages, and menus) used to reference our core IT self-service applications are packaged in this plugin. It is also the core foundation for all Service Management applications.</description> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>All CMS items (blocks, pages, and menus) used to reference our core IT self-service applications are packaged in this plugin. It is also the core foundation for all Service Management applications.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Content_Management_Overview</help> <id>com.snc.service_management.core.cms</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>CMS User Interface - Service Management Core</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.service_management.core.cms/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.cms,com.glide.cms.extensions,com.glide.db_images</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>.snc.service_management.core.cms</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
